title: Judge forces OpenAI to produce 20 million chat logs in copyright lawsuit — CEO Sam Altman's "fair use" defense relies on this
description: OpenAI was recently ordered to hand over 20 million ChatGPT user chat logs in its ongoing legal battle with the New York Times, aimed at supporting copyright infringement claims.
content:
Over the past few years, OpenAI has faced multiple copyright infringement lawsuits, with news outlets and publishers claiming ChatGPT used their content without authorization or compensation.
